translated: The Collection of Birth Stories (Ekakanipāta)🔽The Chapter on Not Giving (Asampadānavagga)
The Crow Birth Story is the tenth.🔽The fourteenth chapter is concluded.
The other, the Rakkhasi, the Khemi,
The one with more than a hundred, the radiant, again;

analyzed: atha ha sa var uttama babbu jaṭa
translated: Then the swan, the best, the Babbu, the matted hair,
The one who fell, the crow, the ten.
